column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I came back. This cafe is definitely good
column2: but just want to point out it's not necessarily better than other cute cafes in montrose. And certainly not worth lining up outside before it opens at 9 am on a Saturday (which many people were doing when we inadvertently arrived early this morning). The croissant is flaky
column3: though the outside is a bit too crispy for my tastes. The cappuccino is a bit too bitter
column4: and I like my coffee strong. Hubby got the Moroccan hash - beef was super tender
column5: though probably not my taste for breakfast. The place is a bit loud and hectic. I still prefer Cafe Brasil across the street.
